mapper.select: select product_name, sum(product_price*amount) money from tbl_cart c, tbl_product p where c.product_id=p.product_id group by product_name order by product_name
select nvl(sum(product_price*amount),0) money from tbl_product p, tbl_cart c where p.product_id=c.product_id and userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (cart_id, userid, product_id, amount) values (seq_cart.nextval, #{userid}, #{product_id}, #{amount})
mapper.select: select cart_id, m.userid, name, p.product_id, product_name, p.picture_url, amount, product_price, product_price*amount money from member m, tbl_cart c, tbl_product p where m.userid=c.userid and p.product_id=c.product_id and m.userid=#{userid}
